name: PushBots
description:
PushBots is a 2 player local game where you need to push your opponent off the map.
The game was done in 1.5 days as I didn't have much time to dedicate for the jam

Keyboard Controls: (preferred)

Player1:
WASD - Movement

Left shift- Activate the pusher

Player 2:

Arrow keys - Movement

Right shift - Activate the pusher

Gamepad controls:

The game can be played on 1 controller

Player 1

Left thumbstick - Movement

Left Trigger - Activate the pusher

Player 2

Right thumbstick - Movement

Right Trigger - Activate the pusher
